rituals.name: Settling Pocket — TS-00005
rituals.plain:
quiet fields: Loosen the hands. Set 5 minutes. Start now.
settling: Exhale longer than inhale. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
suspension: Notice sound and light. Stay for 60 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Return to breath. Return once.
Do one more. Stretch the neck. Keep it small.
Close gently. Set a tiny boundary. Mark next time.
Why: Settling lowers load; suspension creates room.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

quiet fields: Loosen the hands. Set 60 seconds. Start now.
settling: Exhale longer than inhale. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
suspension: Notice sound and light. Stay for 3 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Return to breath. Return once.
Do one more. Stretch the neck. Keep it small.
Close gently. Set a tiny boundary. Mark next time.
Why: Quiet fields widen attention and reduce pressure.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

rituals.name: Soft Anchor — TS-01097
rituals.plain:
quiet field: Drop the shoulders. Set 3 minutes. Start now.
quiet fields: Let the breath fall. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
settling: Name three sensations. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Label it and release. Return once.
Do one more. Step outside briefly. Keep it small.
Close gently. End with one breath. Mark next time.
Why: Settling lowers load; suspension creates room.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

suspension: Unclench the jaw. Set 5 minutes. Start now.
quiet field: Breathe into the belly. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
quiet fields: Scan face and throat. Stay for 60 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Let thoughts pass by. Return once.
Do one more. Drink water slowly. Keep it small.
Close gently. Pick the next calm step. Mark next time.
Why: Quiet fields widen attention and reduce pressure.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

suspension: Unclench the jaw. Set 2 minutes. Start now.
quiet field: Breathe into the belly. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
quiet fields: Scan face and throat. Stay for 5 minutes. Stop at timer.

quiet fields: Loosen the hands. Set 2 minutes. Start now.
settling: Exhale longer than inhale. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
